title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that exposes Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama comparable to ChatGPT interface; supports multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli (sugarforever/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive terminal UI (TUI) for browsing and chatting with Ollama models built with Python and textual.

title: ollama-copilot (cmgriffing/ollama-copilot)
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completions.

title: ollama-rag (gabacode/ollama-rag)
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented generation pipeline combining Ollama LLM, Chroma vector DB, and LangChain for private docs.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java / Kotlin client library for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, pull, etc.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET wrapper for Ollama’s REST API with strongly-typed models and async streams for chat and generation.

title: ollama-helm (tyzbit/ollama-helm)
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker (ollama/ollama)
summary: Official Docker image for running Ollama server and models in containers with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-nix (ollama-nix/ollama-nix)
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible builds of Ollama server and curated model packages for NixOS.

title: ollama-rust (pepperoni21/ollama-rust)
summary: Rust crate that wraps Ollama REST endpoints with async/await support and typed request/response structs.

title: ollama-streamlit (rlancemartin/ollama-streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama for local LLM conversations with session memory.

title: ollama-discord (sockheadrps/ollama-discord)
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers user prompts using Ollama models with slash-command support.

title: ollama-obsidian (joethei/ollama-obsidian)
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM completions and summarizations inside notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack (anakin87/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration by the community exposing Ollama models as Haystack generators for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-slack (optical-ocean-pop/ollama-slack)
summary: Slack bot integration that listens for mentions and responds with locally running Ollama models.

title: ollama-huggingface (huggingface/ollama)
summary: Hugging Face Space demo showing how to pull and serve Ollama models inside HF containers with Gradio UI.
